Instruction

Interface is divided into two parts: base of number system on the left, and number's presentation on the right. Edit number on the right and then all other values will be updated to correspond to the new one.

You can , enter decimal numbers with precision up to

digits relatively to decimal number system, change number by
digits relatively to decimal number system . Press button near translator's base to delete translator or change it's type.

The alphabet below is used to present numbers:

Icons made by Google from www.flaticon.com
